name: WooCommerce Hide Cart When Empty
author: WP Fix It

sections.description:
No need to show your WooCommerce shopping cart icon when the shopping cart is empty. This will hide the cart icon on your site until something is added to it.

Easy setup and and SUPER EASY testing!

Brought to you by WP Fix It

Back when we started our business in 2009, there were very few companies that were specializing in WordPress Support. It was mostly freelancers that built WordPress sites and then had to support them.

  • Resolved our 1st ticket in 2009

  • Average resolve time 30 minutes or less

BEST REASONS TO USE THIS

  • Why show your cart icon if cart is empty

  • Keep content focused on what is useful
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-conflict-finder.zip to plugins via WordPress admin panel or upload unzipped folder to your wp-content/plugins/ folder

  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
sections.faq: For any questions, error reports and suggestions please visit THIS LINK
